answerText: Il Canzoniere [or Rime Sparse or Song Book; accept Scattered Rhymes before read][10] This author of Il Canzoniere dedicated many of his sonnets to his beloved Laura.
heading: Penn Bowl |2013 | 10 | 13 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This collection is separated into the sections "In Life" and "In Death," and it tells how "the world's delight is a brief dream." [10] Name this collection of 366 poems that begins with the line, "You who hear the sound, in scattered rhymes."
